00013     XsecBiasingOperator::XsecBiasingOperator(std::string name) :
00014         G4VBiasingOperator(name) {

00020     void XsecBiasingOperator::StartRun() { 
00021 
00022         G4ProcessManager* processManager{nullptr}; 
00023         if (BiasingMessenger::getParticleType() == "gamma") { 
00024             processManager = G4Gamma::GammaDefinition()->GetProcessManager();
00025         } else { 
00026             // Throw an exception
00027         }
00028 
00029         process_ = BiasingMessenger::getProcess(); 
00030         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: "<< "Process: " << process_ << std::endl;*/ 
00031         const G4BiasingProcessSharedData* sharedData = G4BiasingProcessInterface::GetSharedData(processManager);
00032         if (sharedData) {
00033             for (size_t index = 0 ; index < (sharedData->GetPhysicsBiasingProcessInterfaces()).size(); ++index) {
00034                 const G4BiasingProcessInterface* wrapperProcess = (sharedData->GetPhysicsBiasingProcessInterfaces())[index];
00035                 if (wrapperProcess->GetWrappedProcess()->GetProcessName().compareTo(process_) == 0) { 
00036                     xsecOperation = new G4BOptnChangeCrossSection("changeXsec-" + process_);
00037                     break;
00038                 } 
00039             }
00040         }
00041 
00042         xsecTrans_ = BiasingMessenger::getXsecTrans();
00043     }
00044 
00045     G4VBiasingOperation* XsecBiasingOperator::ProposeOccurenceBiasingOperation(
00046             const G4Track* track, const G4BiasingProcessInterface* callingProcess) {
00047         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: " 
00048                     << "Calling process: " 
00049                     << callingProcess->GetWrappedProcess()->GetProcessName() 
00050                     << std::endl;*/
00051 
00052         if (callingProcess->GetWrappedProcess()->GetProcessName().compareTo(process_) != 0) return 0; 
00053 
00054         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: "
00055                     << "Parent ID: " << track->GetParentID() 
00056                     << " Created within " << track->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex()->GetName() 
00057                     << std::endl;*/
00058 
00059         if (track->GetParentID() != 1) return 0;
00060 
00061         if (track->GetKineticEnergy() < BiasingMessenger::getThreshold()) return 0; 
00062 
00063         G4double interactionLength = callingProcess->GetWrappedProcess()->GetCurrentInteractionLength();
00064         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: "
00065                     << "Interaction length: " 
00066                     << interactionLength << std::endl;*/
00067 
00068         G4double xsec = 1./interactionLength;
00069         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: "
00070                     << "Cross-section: " 
00071                     << xsec << std::endl;*/
00072 
00073         /*std::cout << "[ XsecBiasingOperator ]: "
00074                     << "Cross-section x transformation factor: " 
00075                     << xsec*xsecTrans_ << std::endl;*/
00076 
00077         xsecOperation->SetBiasedCrossSection(xsec*xsecTrans_);
00078         xsecOperation->Sample();
00079 
00080         return xsecOperation;
00081     }
00082
